name: Humanity 404
description:
HUMANITY 404

Take on the role of an Extra Terrestrial who's crash landed on a farmer's property and must take on their job to stay hidden. As the ET, you must plant and harvest crops, cook delicious carrot soup, and sell it at the market while trying to avoid being discovered. But watch out, your ET character needs to get enough rest or they will become rogue and do as they please.

Can you manage the farm, cook the soup and make a profit, all while staying awake and avoiding detection?

Find out in this exciting and challenging adventure game that combines farming, cooking, and stealth action in a unique and captivating experience.

Romy Outteryck (GD) : https://romytchio.itch.io/
Adam Aubart (GA) : https://adam-aubart.itch.io/
Anae Deblock (Illustration + Animated Comic) : https://www.instagram.com/a_iseult/?next=%2F&hl=fr

Mathilde Kerckhove (GA) : https://mathilde-kerckhove.itch.io/
Etienne Javelle (Dev) : https://etiennejavelle.itch.io/
